formula: a(0) = 0, a(1) = 1, a(n) = a(n-1) + a(n-2) + 3.a(n) = A000204(n+2) - 3 = A000045(2n+4)/A000045(n+2) - 3. - _Benoit Cloitre_, Jan 05 2003G.f.: x*(1+2*x)/((1-x)*(1-x-x^2)).
